why_build: The more you fill out your profile, the better matches we can find for you.
p1: My Letter app allows you to meet new friends who share the same passion and personality, message and value people based on your own criteria.
p2: A nickname & an avatar is all you need
p3: Who says a picture is always worth a thousand words? speak your mind freely to your pen pals!
p4: Building a relationship based on values and standards.
p5: We adopt the idea of evaluating the person before delving into the correspondence, adding information about your personality, goals and passions allows you to get friends with the same goals and values.
p9:
BBC launched the Loneliness Experiment on Valentine's Day 2018 a staggering 55,000 people from around the world completed the survey, making it the largest study of loneliness yet.  
  
 according of survey there is About 40% of people aged 16-24 say they feel lonely and sad.
p10: the very intelligent few who would be happier if they were left alone.
p11: In a paper published in the British Journal of Psychology, researchers Norman Li and Satoshi Kanazawa report that highly intelligent people experience lower life satisfaction when they socialize with friends more frequently. These are the Sherlocks and the Newt Scamanders of the world — the very intelligent few who would be happier if they were left alone.
